posts.content:
Hi Paul
Nice to see that the McCreedie interior that graced his loft for so many years has finally escaped! Need some legs? I may have a few kicking around. Also have lots of hinges etc if you get stuck.
Brian

BJ1 wrote:Hi Paul
Nice to see that the McCreedie interior that graced his loft for so many years has finally escaped! Need some legs? I may have a few kicking around. Also have lots of hinges etc if you get stuck.
Brian

Great thanks Brian, definitely need legs and quite a lot of other bits.

Unfortunately it is currently sitting in my loft, but the decorating should be finished this week so I can then start on the rear drawers!

Good....
Tell us what you need..

Think I have tracing of the overengine board for a 64...
G
